statements: DELETE FROM neural_network_configurations WHERE optimizer = 'adam' AND layers LIKE '%convolution%';
DELETE FROM experiments WHERE neural_network_id = 1 AND experiment_date <= '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM neural_networks WHERE activation_function = 'ReLU' OR layers > 5;
DELETE FROM hyperparameters WHERE learning_rate = 0.001 AND batch_size = 64;
DELETE FROM experiments WHERE accuracy < 0.8 OR loss > 0.2;
DELETE FROM experiments WHERE accuracy < 0.8 AND loss > 0.5;
DELETE FROM experiments WHERE experiment_id = 5 AND dataset_id = 3;
